name: Best Actor in a Leading Role
normalized_name: Best Performance by an Actor in a Leading Role

candidates.notes: Niven was a co-host of this year's Academy Awards ceremony. To date, he is the only actor to win an Oscar in the same year serving as a host.

candidates.notes: Wendy Hiller was not present at the awards ceremony. Harold Hecht, the film's producer, accepted on her behalf.

name: Best Art Direction-Set Decoration, Black-and-White or Color
normalized_name: Best Art Direction-Set Decoration, Black-and-White or Color

candidates.notes: William A. Horning's nomination and win was posthumously, as he died after completing his work on Gigi (1958) and in the midst of the production on Ben-Hur (1959) and North by Northwest (1959); the last two films would earn him Oscar nominations and a win (for Ben-Hur alone) the next year.

name: Best Writing, Story and Screenplay - Written Directly for the Screen

candidates.notes: Nedrick Young had been blacklisted at the time and the Oscar went to his pseudonym 'Nathan E. Douglas'. In 1993 AMPAS restored Young's credit upon the request of his widow and recommendation of the Academy's writers branch.
